long_description: Just in time for summer, the Patagonia Maha Breathe ballet-style shoes are nearly all mesh, offering high breathability without skimping on great looks. Highly breathable and wonderfully flexible nylon mesh uppers feature nubuck leather toecaps, trim and heels for great looks and lasting comfort. Leather is sourced from tanneries that strive to minimize harmful effects on the environment caused by its activities. Pigskin leather lines toe pockets and heels while open mesh lines rest of shoes for an exceptionally airy feel. Anatomically-shaped, leather-topped footbeds feature 20% recycled EVA to cushion feet and offer light support. EVA midsoles are made from 20% recycled EVA and feature Air Cushion Plus units under heels to maximize all-day comfort and cushioning. Rubber outsoles offer everyday traction with little bulk.
short_description: Just in time for summer, the Patagonia Maha Breathe ballet-style shoes are nearly all mesh, offering high breathability without skimping on great looks.
